examples.korean: Huge pipes funnel the water down the mountainside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거대한 관들을 통해 그 물을 산 아래로 내려 보낸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Four soldiers stood guard over the coffin. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네 명의 군인이 그 관을 지켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The body was sealed in a lead coffin. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 시신은 납으로 된 관 속에 넣어져 밀봉되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The body was sealed in a lead coffin. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The coffin was carried by six soldiers walking in lockstep. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 관은 발을 맞추어 걷는 6명의 병사들에 의해 운구되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The coffin was carried by six soldiers walking in lockstep. Add to Wordbook
